title: Nested recover from panic doesn't work
body:
by **cvl.chinet**: 
A panic cannot be catched by an nested function.
Please see the example here:
http://play.golang.org/p/LGql4GLPot

If there is not a fundamental problem here, it should be possible.

What does 'go version' print?
go version go1.3.1 linux/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

Run this:
http://play.golang.org/p/LGql4GLPot

What happened?
Panic recovery doesn't work from a nested function

What should have happened instead?
It should be possible in a nested function
